Key Match Events: Pelicans shot 67.4% (31 of 46) through the first 24 minutes
Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson was held out as a precaution after coming back from a left hamstring strain
Brandon Ingram missed his 14th straight game due to a left ankle injury
Herb Jones left the game in the third quarter because of a right shoulder injury
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans looked lethargic, disjointed and at times disinterested
Blazers have won four of seven, with two of the losses in that span by single-digit margins
Pelicans have lost 22 of their last 25 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pelicans played without Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram
Herb Jones missed 18 games earlier this season with a similar injury
The game took place on January 9, 2025
